  • Kidney cancer
  • Kidney cysts
  • Kidney disease, chronic (См.Kidney disease,chronic,also known asChronic kidney disease)

  • Kidney stones
  • Kissing disease (См.Kissing disease,also known asMononucleosis)
  • Klatskin tumor (См.Klatskin tumor,also known asHilar cholangiocarcinoma)

  • Klippel-Trenaunay syndrome
  • Knee bursitis
  • Knee pain

  • Krabbe disease
